headline: Kenvue Deal With Kimberly-Clark Puts Valuation And Dividend In Focus
summary: Shareholders of Kenvue (NYSE:KVUE) have approved the company’s acquisition by Kimberly-Clark, with the deal now awaiting regulatory and closing conditions. Kimberly-Clark shareholders have also voted in favor of the transaction, aligning both sides on the proposed takeover structure. Kenvue has announced that Chief Financial Officer Amit Banati plans to depart following the completion of the acquisition, setting up a key leadership transition. Kenvue enters this phase of corporate change...
